definition: dimension/magnitude/size/measurement/large and small/at any rate/adults and children/consideration of seniority
(in classical literature) young military officer of high rank for his age/(during the Cultural Revolution) young militant in the Red Guard/(in modern usage) rising star (in sport, politics etc)

sentences.english: The little child stammers in the presence of strangers.
sentences.chinese: 那小阿在陌生人面前說話就結巴。

sentences.english: The big boys jumped into the river but little Ned hung back.
sentences.chinese: 大些的男孩子都跳進河裏了，但小內德畏縮不前。

sentences.english: X axis and Y axis adopt ball spiral rods with excellent precisions and low friction factors.
sentences.chinese: 軸採用滾珠螺桿傳動精度佳，摩擦係數小。

sentences.english: At this time, there was a male cat.
Complete disintegration of cytoplasm at stage of vacuolated microspore.
sentences.chinese: 單核液泡期的小孢子細胞質完全解體。

sentences.english: It stands apart with small creatures near its roots.
sentences.chinese: 它站在這裏，與樹下的小動物保持着距離。

sentences.english: 'We are still ironing out the bugs in the system,' said Dr. Lamont.
sentences.chinese: 拉蒙特說，我們仍在消除系統中的小故障。

sentences.english: Cytokines are small, soluble proteins with pleiotropic effects on a variety of cell types.
sentences.chinese: 細胞因子是具有多種生物活性的可溶性小分子蛋白質。

sentences.english: This article is to investigate biorthogonal matrix-valued wavelet packets in higher dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 研究高維矩陣值雙正交小波包的構造及性質。

sentences.english: Small-signal diodes are manufactured with varying response times to changes in voltage.
sentences.chinese: 小信號二極管的電壓變化響應時間可長可短。

sentences.english: Muddy grass and tiny gray mounds of melting snow.
sentences.chinese: 草上粘滿泥污，唯唯一的灰色小雪堆正在溶化。

sentences.english: Small seashells have sometimes been used as a primitive kind of money.
sentences.chinese: 小貝殼有時用作簡單的錢幣。

sentences.english: Melt the butter in a small saucepan.
sentences.chinese: 在小湯鍋中將黃油融化。

sentences.english: If be the fade of little scope only, so complete and OK oneself are its complementary color .
sentences.chinese: 假如只是小範圍的掉色，那麼完全可以自己爲它補色。

sentences.english: Ice is not as dense as water and it therefore floats.
sentences.chinese: 冰的密度比水小，因此能浮在水面上。

sentences.english: The Stegosaurus had a very small brain and was not smart.
sentences.chinese: 劍龍的腦袋非常小，所以不太聰明。

definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
dimension/magnitude/size/measurement/large and small/at any rate/adults and children/consideration of seniority
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
